data.text: Nabi ganla yi a fala Elise xa, e naxa, “A mato nxu tan nun i tan, en na en malanma dɛnaxan yi mɛnna xurun en ma.
Xa i tin, nxu xa siga han Yurudɛn baan dɛ, birin yi xalanbena nde fen mɛnni, nxu yi malanden nafala mɛnni en xa.” Elise yi e yabi, a naxa, “Ɛ siga.”
E tan nde yi a fala a xa, a naxa, “Tin i xa fa i ya walikɛne fɔxɔ ra.” A yi a yabi, a naxa, “N sigama nɛn.”
A yi siga e fɔxɔ ra. E to Yurudɛn baan li, e wudine sɛgɛ.
E tan nde yi xalanbe sɛgɛni, a bunbi mɛlɛnna yi bira igeni. A gbelegbele, a naxa, “N kanna, a xandixin na a ra!”
Sayiban yi a maxɔdin, a naxa, “A biraxi minɛn yi?” A yi a yita a ra. Nayi, Elise yi wudi yiina nde sɛgɛ, a woli na yire kedenni, bunbi mɛlɛnna yi te igen xun ma.
Elise mɔn yi a fala, a naxa, “A tongo.” Na xɛmɛn yi a yiin nasiga, a tongo.
Yɛngɛn yi Arami mangan nun Isirayila yamanan tagi, a yi sofa kuntigine malan, e xa e bode to. Na xanbi ra, a yi a ragidi a ganla xa daaxa dɛnaxan yi.
Koni sayiban yi a fala Isirayila mangan xa, a naxa, “I yɛtɛ rakantan dangu feen na mɛnni, amasɔtɔ Arami kaane fama mɛnni.”
Isirayila mangan yi muxune rasiga mɛnna kantandeni, sayiban dɛnaxan mataxamaseri a xa.
Arami mangan yi yifu na feene fe ra, a a walikɛne xili, a fala e xa, a naxa, “Ɛ mi a falɛ n xa, nde walima Isirayila mangan xa en yɛ?”
A walikɛ keden yi a fala, a naxa, “Muxu yo, n kanna mangana. Koni, Nabi Elise naxan Isirayila yi, i falan naxanye tima i xi banxini, na nan ne falama Isirayila mangan xa.”
Mangan yi a fala, a naxa, “Ɛ siga, a sa dɛnaxan yi, ɛ sa mɛnna to, n xa a suxu.” E yi fa a fala a xa, e naxa, “A Dotan taan nin.”
A yi soone nun yɛngɛ so wontorone rasiga e nun gali gbeena, e sa so kɔɛ tagini e taan nabilin.
Sayibana walikɛɛn yi keli xɔtɔn, a mini, ganla nde yi taan nabilinxi soone nun wontorone ra. Sayibana walikɛɛn yi a fala a xa, a naxa, “N kanna, en nanse ligama?”
A yi a yabi, a naxa, “I nama gaxu, amasɔtɔ naxanye en fɔxɔ ra, ne wuya dangu naxanye e fɔxɔ ra.”

Elise yi Alatala maxandi, a naxa, “N bata i mafan, n ma walikɛɛn yɛɛne rabi alogo a xa toon ti.” Alatala yi walikɛɛn yɛɛne rabi, a geyane to rafexi soone nun yɛngɛ so wontoro tɛɛ kanne ra Elise rabilinni.
Arami kaane yi godo Elise fɛma. A yi Alatala maxandi falani ito ra, a naxa, “Sofani itoe yɛɛne danxu.” Alatala yi e yɛɛne danxu, fata Elise a falan na.
Elise yi a fala sofane xa, a naxa, “Be xa mi kiraan na, taani ito mi a ra, ɛ bira n fɔxɔ ra, ɛ xɛmɛn naxan fenma, n xa ɛ xali na fɛma.” A yi e xali Samari taani.
E to so Samari taani, Elise yi a fala, a naxa, “Alatala muxuni itoe yɛɛne rabi, e xa toon ti.” Alatala yi e yɛɛne rabi, e a to, e Samari taan tagini.
Isirayila mangan to e to, a fala Elise xa, a naxa, “N fafe, n xa e faxa?”
Elise yi a yabi, a naxa, “I mi e faxama. I darixi na muxune faxɛ nɛn ba, naxanye suxi yɛngɛni? Burun nun igen so e yii, e xa e dɛge, e min, na xanbi ra, i e lu e siga e kanna fɛma.”
Isirayila mangan yi donse gbeen so e yii, e e dɛge, e e min, e siga e kanna fɛma. Arami ganle mi fa Isirayila bɔxɔn yɛngɛ na waxatini.
Na dangu xanbini, Arami manga Ben-Hadada yi a ganla birin malan, e sa Samari taan nabilin yɛngɛni.

Na marabilinna fe ra, fitina kamɛ gbeen yi so Samari yi, e yi na raxɔdɔxɔ ayi han sofali xun kedenna yi sarama gbeti gbanan tonge solomasɛxɛ, e nun ganba gbiin kilo tagi yi sarama gbeti gbanan suulun nan na.
Isirayila Mangan yi danguma yinna fari, ɲaxanla nde yi gbelegbele a ra, a naxa, “Mangana, n kanna, nxu rakisi!”
A yi a yabi, a naxa, “Xa Alatala mi i rakisi, n tan i rakisɛ nanse ra? Murutu dɔnxɛ mi fa na, minse dɔnxɛ mi na.”
Mangan mɔn yi a maxɔdin, a naxa, “I waxi nanse xɔn?” A yi a yabi, a naxa, “Ɲaxanla nde nan a falaxi n xa, a naxa, ‘I ya diin ba. En na a don to, tila en yi n fan ma diin don.’
Nxu bata n ma diin ɲin, nxu yi a don. Na xɔtɔn bode, n yi a fala a xa, n naxa, ‘I ya diin ba, en na a don.’ Koni a bata a diin luxun.”
Mangan to ɲaxanla falane mɛ, a a dugine yibɔ, a dangumatɔna yinna fari, yamaan yi a to a kasa bɛnbɛnla ragodoxi a ma sununi a domaan bun.
Mangan yi a fala, a naxa, “Ala xa n tɔrɔ a ɲaxun birin yi xa Safati a dii xɛmɛna Elise xunna lu a dɛ to.”

Anu Elise yi dɔxi a banxini, fonne yi dɔxi a fɛma. Mangan yi muxuna nde rasiga a fɛma. Koni benun xɛraan xa so, Elise yi a fala fonne xa, a naxa, “Ɛ mato, faxa tiini ito muxun nafama n xunna sɛgɛdeni n dɛ! Ɛ tuli mati. Xɛraan na fa, ɛ dɛɛn balan, ɛ a radinɲɛ ayi dɛɛn na. Yanla, en mi a kanna san xuiin mɛma a xanbi ra ba?”
Elise mɔn yi fala tiini singen, xɛraan yɛtɛɛn yi ti dɛɛn na, a yi mangan fala xuiin ti, a naxa, “Tɔrɔni ito birin kelixi Alatala nan ma, n mɔn fa nɔɛ n yigi tiyɛ nanse gbɛtɛ mɔn na Ala yii?”
